name: Karlson Flex
description:
karlson likes milk. but he also got fat in the 4 months he hasn't been in public. so he looks online, and fins an article saying "Eating Pizza, Burgers, And Ice-cream is linked to weight gain" so he puts on his sweat band and heads to the gym.

Collect Milk to get a multiplier. Block Pizza, Burgers, And Ice-cream with your dumbbells. Ads give you a multiplier, but block the screen so click on them to make them go away

Controls:

mouse
